amendment.description: To require reports on the implementation of the Darfur Peace Agreement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4439 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4439 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S6377-6392) To require reports on the implementation of the Darfur Peace Agreement.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4439 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4439 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
